title: Honors College Senior Thesis
desc: Conducted research  by examining publications to design a data science project. Analyzed the response of higher education institutions using data visualizations.

title: Undergraduate Researcher
org: Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, Adelphi University
desc: Collaborated graph theory research with professor and peers. Examined winning strategies for families of graphs used during graph burning games.

title: Research Fellow
desc: Assisted in advancing research on the Armitage and Doll model of carcinogenesis, and presented the findings at multiple mathematics research conferences.
